long_description: The Salomon Z12 B100 downhill ski bindings offer advanced skiers a high-performance connection to their skis; and are suited to those weighing between 94 and 264 lbs. With a stiff construction, the Z12 B100 bindings maximize side-to-side energy transmission to precisely transmit your motions to the edges of the skis. Long, automatically adjusting toe wings increase the contact zone with your boots for precise boot hold and enhanced energy transmission to edges. Pivoting design controls release during backward falls. 100mm brake width fits most all-mountain wide skis and some powder skis; 4 - 12 DIN range provides assertive skiers with high performance.
short_description: The Salomon Z12 B100 downhill ski bindings offer advanced skiers a high-performance connection to their skis; and are suited to those weighing between 94 and 264 lbs.
